name: Terry is over 40 on the date of his exam

testSteps.description: Given Terry is a 3rd class pilot
Given he was born on 2 February 1983
When he has a medical exam on 3 June 2023
Then his medical certificate will expire on 30 June 2025

userStory.storyName: Determining when a pilot is due for a medical examination
userStory.displayName: Determining when a pilot is due for a medical examination
userStory.narrative:
As a pilot
  I want to know when my medical certificate will expire
  So that I can renew my certificate at the right time and comply with FAA regulations

featureTag.name: Medicals/Determining when a pilot is due for a medical examination

title: Terry is over 40 on the date of his exam

tags.name: Medicals/Determining when a pilot is due for a medical examination
tags.displayName: Determining when a pilot is due for a medical examination

rule.name: Certificates for 3rd class licenses expire after 2 years for pilots over 40 and after 5 years for pilots under 40

steps: Given Terry is a 3rd class pilot
